title: Boundaries of the Promised Land
summary: Numbers 34 defines the geographic boundaries of the land of Canaan and names the leaders who will help divide it among the tribes. Eleazar the priest and Joshua will oversee the process.

faq.question: Who was responsible for dividing the land?
faq.answer: Eleazar the priest, Joshua, and one leader from each tribe.

faq.question: What does this chapter emphasize?
faq.answer: That the inheritance was planned and organized under Godâ€™s direction.
